benchmark_details.name: Multi-layer Algerian Dialect Corpus
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce a newly annotated corpus of Algerian user-generated comments comprising parallel annotations of Algerian written in Latin, Arabic, and code-switched scripts, as well as annotations for sentiment and topic categories.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To investigate the interplay of script and typology on cross-lingual transfer for two tasks: part-of-speech tagging and sentiment analysis.

data.source: Algerian user-generated comments reflecting the nature of the Algerian vernacular dialect.
data.annotation: Annotated by native speakers of Algerian, Arabic, and French.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy for POS tagging and Macro F1 for sentiment analysis.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy represents better model performance on the tasks.
methodology.validation: Benchmark experiments conducted using various model architectures.
